Text.Page:
Knowing your heart's desire will guide you in choosing a faction to join.

If wealth is what drives you, you have something in common with the Free Traders Collective. Physical resilience is highly-prized in the Iron Order. The Enlightened Union leans toward the power that comes from having a solid reputation.
So, what's your heart's desire? Which faction's values match your own?
If you are not a Guild Master, I'm afraid I can't help you.
Our leaders should be either the boldest, the bravest, or the wisest. Which would you choose?
